participant_1.background:
I am an ovo-vegetarian who is trying to lose weight.
I'm always on the go and my glasses are always dirty, so I take them off and clean them every time I get a chance.
I'm not happy with my job or marriage, but I'm trying to make the best of it.
i just took a trip to london.
Others may be disappointed that I didn't pass the audition, but I'll keep trying my best.

participant_2.background:
I collect guitar picks and guitar strings to use in my music.
My parents are supportive of my career as a party planner, but they are worried about me being lonely.
i just bought my first car.
I am still trying to lose weight.
i have a cheap car my dad gave me.

content.text: I'm doing okay, just got my first car!
Oh wow, that's awesome! What kind of car is it?
It's a used Honda Civic. It's a little older but it's in good shape.
That's great! I'm sure you'll enjoy it.
Thanks! I'm excited to be able to get around more easily.
I'm sure your parents are happy for you too.
Yeah, they are. They're a little worried about me being lonely, but I'm sure I'll be fine.
I'm sure you will be too. You seem like a great person.
So, what do you like to do for fun?
I like to play music, go to concerts, and hang out with my friends.
Nice! I like to do some of those things too.
What kind of music do you play?
Cool! Me too! What kind of music do you like to play?
I like to play a lot of different kinds of music, but I mostly play rock and blues.
